meta.title: Santhosh Boggala - Software Engineer Portfolio
meta.description: Software Engineer passionate about building innovative and scalable applications. Skilled in solving complex problems and thriving in fast-paced, collaborative and technology-driven teams.
meta.author: Santhosh Boggala

profile.name: Santhosh Boggala
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.summary: Software Engineer passionate about building innovative and scalable applications. Skilled in solving complex problems and thriving in fast-paced, collaborative and technology-driven teams.

description: Resolved 50+ issues, including bug fixes and RCAs, ensuring system stability and a seamless customer experience.
Developed a WMS billing platform to analyze customer usage and dynamically calculate charges based on predefined parameters and formulas.
Automated monthly billing operations using Celery jobs, generating detailed reports and sending automated emails to finance managers, reducing manual effort.
Improved backend reliability by optimizing database queries, enhancing API performance, and streamlining asynchronous task execution.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver production-ready features and ensure timely, high-quality releases.
Developed and maintained 500+ automation test cases for TMS and WMS using WebdriverIO and Playwright, ensuring high coverage and faster release cycles.
Reduced test execution time by 65% through optimized test flows, parallel execution, and elimination of redundant tests, improving CI/CD efficiency.
Implemented a custom wait mechanism in Playwright to detect idle network states, reducing flaky test failures by 50% and decreasing test runtime by 20%.
Contributed to backend development by fixing WMS (Django) bugs and performing RCA for production issues.

education.institution: Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies
Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies

honors.title: LeetCode Problem Solver
honors.description: Successfully solved 200+ problems on LeetCode and 350+ across coding platforms demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and consistency in data structures and algorithms.

honors.title: Development Coordinator
honors.description: Served as Development Coordinator at the SRC Club, mentoring peers in building real-world projects and enhancing development skills.

projects.name: ShreeHaven
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce website with customer and admin features, product suggestions, and order tracking.
projects.longDescription: Built a full-stack e-commerce website with customer and admin features, product suggestions, product management, order tracking, and an easy-to-use interface using MERN stack.

projects.name: ChitChat
projects.description: Real-time chat application with group chats, guest messaging, and secure single-session login.
projects.longDescription: Built a real-time chat app with group chats, guest messaging, and secure single-session login using React.js, Node.js, and Socket.io.

projects.name: Ecommerce API
projects.description: RESTful API for a shopping website with comprehensive product and order management.
projects.longDescription: This is my first REST API project for a shopping website. Built with Node.js and Express.js, featuring product management, user authentication, and order processing capabilities.

projects.name: Restaurant API
projects.description: RESTful API for restaurant management system with menu and order handling.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive REST API for restaurant operations including menu management, order processing, and customer service features.

projects.name: ExploreBlogApp
projects.description: Blog application to explore and publish posts with user accounts.
projects.longDescription: Built a blog application named ExploreBlogApp with features like user authentication, creating/editing/publishing blog posts, and exploring posts from other users.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills.
projects.longDescription: Created a personal dynamic portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, experience and provide a way for potential employers/clients to contact me.
